Text:
function EP03_07()

    --.起-5【7月第3週】「出し物決めはよく考えて」
    SaveData.Title = "出し物決めはよく考えて"

    --//BG：1-A教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ Finally, with summer vacation starting tomorrow, Yuriai Private Academy is all excited. ]])

    MSG([[ After our class 1-A’s closing ceremony, we stayed behind in the classroom to discuss what kind of event we would prepare during the summer break. ]])

    --//BU：ヒユ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_HIY01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0203.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Normal
 "The ideas so far are... Erika Ikusa’s cat-ear maid café. Erika Ikusa’s homemade rice ball stand. Erika Ikusa’s Perfect Arrest Technique Class." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0510.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Sad
 "Um... I’d like to exclude anything centered around me for now..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The abundance of self-indulgent ideas isn’t much different from the boys’ group. ]])

    MSG([[ Watching the discussion, I thought that our 1-A classmates would probably get along well with the boys’ group. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0204.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Normal
 "You haven’t shared your own idea since earlier, Erika. Don’t you have any hopes or wishes?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu noticed I was avoiding speaking and asked me about it. ]])

    MSG([[ What should I do? I’m thinking of suggesting to collaborate with the boys’ group, but I can’t seem to find the right moment to bring it up. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0511.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Wry Smile
 "Sorry. If I speak carelessly, I feel like it might awkwardly shift the flow." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0512.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 "I want to hear what everyone else wants to do first." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That was my honest feeling. It would be too sad if something people really want to do gets overlooked because they can’t express it when I speak. ]])

    MSG([[ Just because I’m the 'princess' doesn’t mean everyone has to obey my opinion 100%. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_HIY01ma")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0205.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Excited
 "Wh-what a merciful thought... A heart full of kindness... This unworthy Hiyu apologizes for having asked such a tactless question not knowing your deep thoughts!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0513.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Wry Smile
 "N-no... it’s not really such a deep thought." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUS_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ At that moment, in the corner of the classroom, I noticed a timid long-haired girl, Tsudanuma, hesitating whether to raise her hand. ]])

    MSG([[ I made eye contact with Tsudanuma, smiled, and silently encouraged her. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0514.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 (—It’s okay. Please share your idea.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Tsudanuma seemed to understand my eye contact and timidly raised her hand to share her opinion. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("meme_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tsudanuma Meme】
 "U-um... I want to do... a p-play with everyone in this class..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0515.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 "A play? What kind of play?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("meme_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tsudanuma Meme】
 "I-actually have been secretly writing the script..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0516.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Eh!? Th-that’s amazing!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//SE：モノを置く音（どすん）
PLAY_SE("SEb033.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ Tsudanuma placed a script on the desk, about the length of a newly published novel. ]])

    MSG([[ This isn’t something you can write in a day or two. She must have been quietly working on it behind the scenes until it was finally done. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0517.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "That’s really an impressive amount. Even from a quick glance just now, I could feel the characters’ emotions conveyed through the dialogue... Honestly, it’s wonderful." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("meme_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tsudanuma Meme】
 "E-eh heh heh. Actually... since seeing Erika Ikusa’s appeal during the Princess Election, the story kept expanding in my head... I couldn’t help but write it." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("meme_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tsudanuma Meme】
 "If Erika Ikusa would play this role, I think it will become a play that brings joy to many people…" ]])

    --//BU：ヒユ（興奮）
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BUL_HIY01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-700,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(70,-500,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BUL_HIY01mb")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-500,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)


PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0206.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Excited Nosebleed
 "A play starring Erika... Just imagining it is making my nose bleed!" ]])

    MSG([[ People who had glanced over the script looked at me expectantly. ]])

    MSG([[ S-somehow it felt like the class was already starting to settle on the idea of performing this play. ]])

    MSG([[ There are a few issues I need to resolve before I can take a role, though. What should I do? ]])

    MSG([[ No, wait.— Precisely because of those issues, having the boys’ group cooperate on the stage performance might make this script the perfect choice. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0518.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 "If everyone wishes for it, I will do my best to perform the part." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0519.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 "But after reading the script just now, I came up with one idea. May I share it?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BUL_HIY01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-500,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0207.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Surprised
 "An idea?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0520.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smile
 "Yes. I want to ask the boys’ group to cooperate as well." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Because it was so unexpected, the class suddenly went silent. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ I carefully explained why the boys’ group was necessary for this play. ]])
    --//SE：心臓の音
PLAY_SE("SEa025.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ After that, all I could do was pray. ]])

    MSG([[ —Please. I hope everyone can understand this... ]])

STOP_SE("SEa025.wav")
    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("meme_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tsudanuma Meme】
 "I-I think that idea is really great." ]])

    LAYER_POSITION(70,0,0)

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｄ×２、Ａ
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-800,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Heiwadou Ine】
 "It’s perfect for promotion with that kind of buzz." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Heiwadou Jatsuko】
 "If we make and sell merchandise, we’ll make a killing again… Oh ho ho ho." ]])

    MSG([[ Gradually, everyone began to find my idea interesting, and in no time nearly the entire class agreed with me. ]])

    MSG([[ Even accounting for the influence of my words as the 'princess,' everyone also thought that, given the content of the script, involving the boys’ group would be more fun. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_HIY01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0208.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Serious
 "Hmmmm. I really don’t want to interact with those filthy boys... but if Erika wishes it, I will accept it." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0209.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Serious
 "Now everyone! Have you found something you like among the ideas presented? Have you expressed your favorite ideas fully? Do you have any regrets!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0210.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Serious
 "Then we will take a vote. I’ll call out the event names from the top, so please cast one vote for your favorite." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ As Hiyu asked one by one, Tsudanuma’s play impressively received the most votes. ]])

    MSG([[ Just as Ouga had hoped, the plan for the boys’ and girls’ groups to cooperate on the stage performance was approved. ]])

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("meme_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tsudanuma Meme】
 "Th-thank you very much, Erika. It feels like a dream." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0521.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I didn’t do anything. It’s just that everyone chose Tsudanuma’s script because it’s really wonderful. That’s all." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(2000)

    MSG([[ At that moment—I noticed a girl watching us from the hallway. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")

    --//BG：4F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｆ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB09aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ She is also one of my 'knights,' named Yurin Ryuguuin. ]])

    MSG([[ Among the young ladies at this academy, she is from one of the most distinguished noble families. ]])

    MSG([[ Come to think of it, she was one of the few who raised her hand besides the theater suggestion, but I wonder if she has something on her mind about me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Yurin Ryuguuin】
 "...Knight." ]])
    -- ＊小声で「裏切り者」と言っている。
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Yurin whispered a single word in a truly quiet voice, then looked away from me and left. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ No matter how much I thought, I couldn’t figure out what exactly she wanted to say to me. ]])
    --　　　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_08")
end
